title: Gallic War 5 48 - we learn in lines 1-4

content.question: In lines 1-4 (Tum . . . cognoscantur), we learn that Caesar

choices.label: kept the cavalry happy with generous bribes
feared the enemy might learn his plans
wrote a farewell letter to Cicero
spoke to his own soldiers in Greek

content.answer: feared the enemy might learn his plans
